plot: Video Brinquedo brings us a rip-off of Kung Fu Panda. A panda named Pancada who works at a boxing club wishes to become a dancer, but gets caught up in an upcoming fight due to a case of mistaken identity.
title: Ursinho da Pesada
plot_es: Video Brinquedo brings us a rip-off of Kung Fu Panda. A panda named Pancada who works at a boxing club wishes to become a dancer, but gets caught up in an upcoming fight due to a case of mistaken identity.
plot_en: Video Brinquedo brings us a rip-off of Kung Fu Panda. A panda named Pancada who works at a boxing club wishes to become a dancer, but gets caught up in an upcoming fight due to a case of mistaken identity.

cast.role: Bear on Cell Phone /              Judge #1 /              Carinhuso
cast.name: Wallace Costa
